languages.text: На пустынной, плохо пригодной для жизни планете обнаружилось человеческое жилище. Разведчики доложили, что там обитает одинокий отшельник, посвятивший дни молитвам Императору.
A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.
languages.original_text: На пустынной, плохо пригодной для жизни планете обнаружилось человеческое жилище. Разведчики доложили, что там обитает одинокий отшельник, посвятивший дни молитвам Императору.

traits.locale_text: There's a small inhabited building on a barren desert planet. The search team has discovered that a lonely hermit lives there, spending his days in prayers to the Emperor.
There's a small inhabited building on a barren desert planet. The search team has discovered that a lonely hermit lives there, spending his days in prayers to the Emperor.
A small man-made building stands on this barren, deserted planet. The search team has discovered that a lonely old hermit lives there, spending his days in prayer to the Emperor.
A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.
A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.
A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

languages.text: 这颗被人遗忘的荒芜行星上，有着一座小小的人类居所。侦察兵报告说，这座居所里住着一位年迈的隐士，整天都在向帝皇祈祷。
languages.original_text: A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 这颗被人遗忘的荒芜行星上，有着一座小小的人类居所。侦察兵报告说，这座居所里住着一位年迈的隐士，整天都在向帝皇祈祷。

languages.text: Una pequeña vivienda humana se alza en este planeta desierto y árido. Los exploradores informan de que en su interior vive un viejo ermitaño que se pasa los días rezando al Emperador.
languages.original_text: A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Una pequeña vivienda humana se alza en este planeta desierto y árido. Los exploradores informan de que en su interior vive un viejo ermitaño que se pasa los días rezando al Emperador.

languages.text: この不毛で荒れ果てた惑星に、人間の小さな住まいが建っている。調査隊によると、そこには年老いた世捨て人が住んでおり、日々皇帝に祈りを捧げているという。
languages.original_text: A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: この不毛で荒れ果てた惑星に、人間の小さな住まいが建っている。調査隊によると、そこには年老いた世捨て人が住んでおり、日々皇帝に祈りを捧げているという。

languages.text: Auf diesem öden, verlassenen Planeten steht eine kleine menschliche Behausung. Späher berichten, dass dort ein alter Einsiedler lebt, der seine Tage damit verbringt, zum Imperator zu bieten.
languages.original_text: A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Auf diesem öden, verlassenen Planeten steht eine kleine menschliche Behausung. Späher berichten, dass dort ein alter Einsiedler lebt, der seine Tage damit verbringt, zum Imperator zu bieten.

languages.text: Une petite maison humaine se tient sur cette planète aride et déserte. Les éclaireurs signalent qu'un vieil ermite vit là-bas et passe ses journées à prier pour l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: A small human dwelling stands on this barren, deserted planet. Scouts report that an old hermit lives there, who spends his days in prayer to the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Une petite maison humaine se tient sur cette planète aride et déserte. Les éclaireurs signalent qu'un vieil ermite vit là-bas et passe ses journées à prier pour l'Empereur.
